question: How do I place an order on your website?
answer: To place an order, simply browse our products, add your desired items to the cart, and proceed to checkout by providing your shipping and payment information.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, Klarna, and Apple Pay.

question: Can I pay using PayPal or cryptocurrency?
answer: Yes, we accept PayPal. At this time, we do not accept cryptocurrency.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Absolutely. Your payment information is protected using secure SSL encryption and trusted payment gateways.

question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
answer: Orders can only be modified before they are shipped. Contact us as soon as possible for assistance.

question: How can I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel your order by contacting our support team before the order is dispatched.

question: Can I place an order over the phone?
answer: No, all orders must be placed through our website for secure processing.

question: What happens if the item goes out of stock after I order it?
answer: If an item goes out of stock after ordering, we will notify you and offer an alternative, refund, or notify you when it's available again.

question: Will I receive an invoice for my purchase?
answer: Yes, an invoice is automatically emailed after your purchase is completed.

question: Can I get a copy of my past orders?
answer: You can view and download past orders by logging into your account and navigating to "Order History".

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Check our shipping page for details.

question: How much does shipping cost?
answer: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location and the size/weight of your order.

question: How long will delivery take?
answer: Standard delivery usually takes 2-5 business days. Expedited options are available.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: You can track your order through the tracking link sent via email once your order is shipped.

question: What courier services do you use?
answer: We use DHL, UPS, and local courier services depending on your location.

question: Can I choose the delivery date?
answer: Currently, we do not offer scheduled delivery. You can track and prepare for your delivery via the tracking number.

question: Do you offer same-day or next-day delivery?
answer: Same-day or next-day delivery is available in select locations-check availability during checkout.

question: Can I pick up my order in-store?
answer: No, we currently do not offer local pick-up.

question: What if I am not home during delivery?
answer: If you're not home, the courier will attempt a re-delivery or leave instructions for pickup.

question: What should I do if my package is delayed?
answer: If your package is delayed, please contact us and we'll investigate the status with the courier.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery for unused and unopened items.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item, go to your account, find your order, and request a return. We will email you further instructions.

question: Do I have to pay for return shipping?
answer: Return shipping is covered only for defective or incorrect items. Otherwise, customers are responsible.

question: Can I exchange a product for a different one?
answer: Yes, items can be exchanged for a different model or color, subject to availability.

question: How long does it take to process a return?
answer: Once we receive the item, processing your return/refund may take 3-7 business days.

question: Can I return an opened item?
answer: Opened items can be returned if they are defective. Non-defective opened items may not be eligible.

question: What if the item is damaged or defective?
answer: Contact us immediately with pictures and details if your product arrives damaged or not working.

question: Can I return a gift I received?
answer: Yes, you can return a gifted item with the order number or purchaser's email.

question: Will I get a full refund?
answer: Refunds are processed back to the original payment method once the return is approved.

question: How do I know if my return has been approved?
answer: We'll notify you via email once your return is received and inspected.

question: How do I know if a laptop is compatible with my needs?
answer: Check the product description and compare specifications, or contact our support for guidance.

question: Do you provide product comparisons?
answer: Yes, we offer product comparisons on select pages and via customer support.

question: Can I get help choosing a device?
answer: Absolutely, our team is happy to help you choose the right device for your needs.

question: Are all your products brand new?
answer: Yes, all products are 100% brand new unless clearly labeled as refurbished.

question: Do your products come with warranties?
answer: Most products come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. Details are in the product description.

question: Where can I find product manuals?
answer: Product manuals are usually available in the product listing or on the manufacturer's website.

question: What if a product has missing parts?
answer: Please report missing parts within 48 hours and we'll arrange a replacement.

question: Can I get support after purchase?
answer: Yes, our support team is available after purchase to help with setup or troubleshooting.

question: Do you sell refurbished or used devices?
answer: We do not sell used devices. Refurbished items are listed clearly as such with warranty details.

question: How can I ask questions about a specific product?
answer: Click the "Ask a Question" button on the product page or contact us directly.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click "Sign Up" at the top of the page, enter your details, and confirm your email.

question: What are the benefits of having an account?
answer: Account holders can track orders, save addresses, and get faster checkout.

question: I forgot my password—how can I reset it?
answer: Click "Forgot Password?" on the login page and follow the reset instructions.

question: How can I update my personal information?
answer: Log into your account and go to "Profile" to update your personal information.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Contact our support to request account deletion.

question: Can I shop without creating an account?
answer: Yes, guest checkout is available, but you won't be able to track orders or save your info.

question: Is my personal data secure?
answer: Your data is protected and handled according to GDPR and privacy standards.

question: Can I save my favorite products?
answer: Yes, click the heart icon next to any product to save it to your wishlist.

question: How do I view my past orders?
answer: Go to "My Orders" under your account dashboard to view past purchases.

question: Can I subscribe to your newsletter?
answer: Subscribe during checkout or via the newsletter form at the bottom of our homepage.

question: Do you offer discount codes?
answer: Yes, we regularly offer discounts-check our homepage or subscribe to our newsletter.

question: Where can I enter a promo code?
answer: You can enter a promo code during checkout on the payment page.

question: How do I know when there’s a sale?
answer: Subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on sales.

question: Can I use multiple promo codes?
answer: Only one promo code can be used per order unless stated otherwise.

question: Do you sell gift cards?
answer: Yes, we sell digital gift cards in various amounts.

question: How do I redeem a gift card?
answer: Enter your gift card code at checkout in the "Gift Card" field.

question: Can I check my gift card balance?
answer: Check your balance by clicking the "Gift Card Balance" link on our site.

question: Can I use a gift card more than once?
answer: Yes, as long as there is remaining balance, it can be used for multiple orders.

question: Do gift cards expire?
answer: Gift cards do not expire, unless otherwise stated on the card.

question: Can I get a refund for a gift card?
answer: No, gift cards are non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash.

question: Will I be charged tax on my order?
answer: Yes, applicable taxes are calculated based on your shipping address and shown at checkout.

question: Can I get a VAT invoice?
answer: Yes, VAT invoices are available-contact support with your order number.

question: Why was I charged twice?
answer: Duplicate charges are rare-please contact us immediately if you see one.

question: What should I do if my card is declined?
answer: Try using another card or contact your bank if your payment is declined.

question: Can I split payments across two cards?
answer: Unfortunately, we cannot split payments across multiple cards.

question: What currencies do you accept?
answer: We accept payments in Euro, USD, and other major currencies depending on your location.

question: Can I pay in installments?
answer: Installment plans are available via Klarna or PayPal (subject to eligibility).

question: How do refunds show up on my account?
answer: Refunds will appear on your statement within 5-10 business days after processing.

question: Can I change my billing address?
answer: To change your billing address, go to your account settings before placing an order.

question: What is your billing cycle?
answer: We charge immediately upon successful checkout. There is no recurring billing.

question: How long is the warranty on products?
answer: Warranties vary, but most devices have a 1-year manufacturer warranty.

question: What does the warranty cover?
answer: The warranty usually covers hardware defects and manufacturing faults.

question: How do I claim warranty service?
answer: Contact us with your order number and issue, and we'll help you initiate the claim.

question: Can I extend my warranty?
answer: Some products offer optional extended warranty-check product details or add at checkout.

question: What is not covered under warranty?
answer: Accidental damage, misuse, and unauthorized repairs are not covered.

question: Who handles the warranty—your shop or the manufacturer?
answer: Most warranties are handled by the manufacturer, but we can help guide you through it.

question: How long do repairs take?
answer: Repair timelines vary, but we aim for 7-14 business days depending on the issue.

question: Will I be charged for repairs?
answer: If the product is under warranty, repairs are typically free unless the damage is excluded.

question: Can I repair a product myself without voiding the warranty?
answer: Self-repairing may void the warranty. Always check terms before opening a device.

question: How can I check the warranty status?
answer: Contact us to check your product's warranty status using the order number.

question: Is this product in stock?
answer: Availability is listed on each product page-"In Stock" or "Out of Stock".

question: When will an out-of-stock item be available again?
answer: Click "Notify Me" on out-of-stock items to get an email when they return.

question: Can I pre-order upcoming products?
answer: Yes, you can pre-order select upcoming devices. Look for the "Pre-Order" badge.

question: How accurate is the stock information on your site?
answer: Stock levels are updated in real-time but may occasionally change during checkout.

question: Do you restock clearance items?
answer: Clearance items are not usually restocked once sold out.

question: Can I reserve an item before it’s back in stock?
answer: We do not accept reservations, but you can sign up for restock alerts.

question: Are quantities limited per customer?
answer: To ensure fairness, we may limit quantities per customer on popular items.

question: Do you notify customers when an item is available?
answer: Yes, enable notifications or subscribe to our back-in-stock alerts.

question: Are your prices the same in-store and online?
answer: Prices may vary between online and in-store (if applicable), based on current promotions.

question: What if an item I received is different from what I ordered?
answer: If you receive the wrong item, contact us immediately for a replacement or refund.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact us via our support page, email, or live chat during business hours.

question: What are your customer service hours?
answer: Support is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM CET.

question: Do you offer support in multiple languages?
answer: Yes, support is available in English, German, and French.

question: Can I live chat with a support agent?
answer: Yes, use the live chat widget on the bottom right of the screen.

question: How long does it take to get a reply?
answer: We typically respond to emails within 24 hours on business days.

question: Where can I file a complaint?
answer: Submit complaints through our support form or email us directly.

question: How do I give feedback about my shopping experience?
answer: We welcome feedback! Use the feedback form on the order confirmation page or contact us directly.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes, our loyalty program rewards points for every purchase-details on our homepage.

question: Can I follow you on social media?
answer: Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn for news, tips, and deals.

question: Where are you located?
answer: We are located in Munich, Germany. Online-only operations currently.
